page.title: 19RAF BRIZE NORTON,AMENITIES
page.content: RAF Brize Norton is like a small town. There are houses (married quarters)for the families on the base and in{ {Carterton.}The station has its own {amenities}including a NAAFI supermarket shop selling food and durable goods. The{recreational {facilities}include a swimming pool,bowling alley,tennis courts, cinema,gymnasium and a ski slope. The sports fields have football,hockey and rugby pitches and there are indoor facilities for basket ball,badminton, netball,volley ball and squash. There are seperate accomodation and social facilities for officers and SNCO's; Corporals and Airmen each have their own clubs but eat together in the Airmen's mess. There are two{medical {centres}and two{churches}. For passengers travelling on the VC_10's there is an{hotel}& an{air terminal.}
